top.title: MemoLia
top.subtitle: Organize and store your favorite URLs
top.tagline: Simple and easy-to-use URL management app

bookmark.title: Favorite URL Registration
bookmark.description: Easily register and manage your favorite URLs

customize.title: Customization Settings
customize.description: Freely categorize with categories, genres, and tags

search.title: Fast Search
search.description: Quickly discover URLs with categories, genres, and tags

cta.title: Start Now
cta.description:
Quick login with Google・GitHub・Discord!
Start secure URL management without passwords?

auth.title: Authentication
auth.subtitle: Sign in to your account to start using MemoLia
auth.description: Please sign in using one of the following methods
auth.safariBookmarkletMessage: To use the bookmarklet in Safari, please log in to MemoLia first. Private mode is not supported.

google.name: Sign in with Google
google.description: Sign in with your Google account

github.name: Sign in with GitHub
github.description: Sign in with your GitHub account

discord.name: Sign in with Discord
discord.description: Sign in with your Discord account

auth.terms: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.loginSubDescription: No password required, login with your preferred account

dashboard.title: Dashboard

emptyState.title: No categories found
emptyState.description: Create a new category folder to organize your URLs

dashboard.retryLater: Please try again after a while

errors.nameTooLong: Category name must be 50 characters or less
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 200 characters or less

authRequired.title: Authentication Required
authRequired.description: You need to log in to access this page.

notFound.title: Category Not Found
notFound.description: The specified category does not exist or has been deleted.

genres.title: Genres
genres.description: You can manage genres belonging to this category. Genres are used to classify URLs more specifically.
genres.comingSoon: Genre functionality will be implemented in the future
genres.emptyDescription: No genres have been created for this category yet.

errors.nameAlreadyExists: This genre name is already in use
errors.nameTooLong: Genre name is too long (50 characters max)
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description is too long (200 characters max)

errors.nameTooLong: Genre name must be 50 characters or less
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 200 characters or less

notFound.title: Genre Not Found
notFound.description: The specified genre does not exist or you don't have access permission.

categoryNotFound.title: Category Not Found
categoryNotFound.description: The specified category does not exist or you don't have access permission.

authRequired.title: Login Required
authRequired.description: Please log in to use this feature.

urls.title: URL List
urls.description: List of URLs saved in this genre.
urls.empty: No URLs have been saved in this genre yet.
urls.emptyDescription: Add URLs to organize your favorite sites.
urls.placeholder: URL information will be displayed here (to be implemented)

placeholders.title: Enter site title
placeholders.description: Enter a description for this URL (optional)

errors.titleTooLong: Title must be 200 characters or less
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 500 characters or less

success.title: URL Created Successfully
success.description: The URL has been created successfully.

share.title: Save Shared Link
share.description: Select category and genre to save the URL

bookmarklet.title: Safari URL Save Settings
bookmarklet.description: Set up iPhone Safari to send URLs to MemoLia
bookmarklet.step1Description: Press the button below to copy the bookmarklet
bookmarklet.step2Description: Open any webpage in Safari and tap the share button (square with arrow)
bookmarklet.step3Description: Select 'Add to Bookmarks', save it first, then edit the name to 'Send to MemoLia' and paste the copied bookmarklet to save
bookmarklet.tip: After setup, you can save URLs from any webpage using Bookmarks → 'Send to MemoLia'

genreAdd.title: Create Genre | Memolia
genreAdd.description: Create a new genre to classify your URLs more specifically

genreDetail.title: Genre Details | Memolia
genreDetail.description: View and manage URLs saved in this genre

urlAdd.title: Create URL | Memolia
urlAdd.description: Add new URLs to organize your bookmarks
